BulkCodes.partnerSignupInfo: Use of this feature by Companies is subject to partnership with Plant-for-the-Planet. Please contact <partnerEmailLink>partner@plant-for-the-planet.org</partnerEmailLink> for details.
BulkCodes.bulkCodesDescription1: Using PlanetCash you can generate thousands of codes in a single operation. Generating tree certificates will increase your tree count.
BulkCodes.bulkCodesDescription2: You can use this feature to create codes for custom certificates, gift cards, donations on behalf of users and redeemable codes that you can associate with your products.

importMethodText.title: Create Custom Tree Certificates
importMethodText.subtitle: Use this method (for a maximum of 1000 recipients in one transaction) if one of the following criteria match your use case:

details.line1: I want to provide the Recipient's name or Email for each code.
details.line2: I want Plant-for-the-Planet to automatically email the recipients once it has been generated (optional).
details.line3: I want to issue codes for different tree counts.

genericMethodText.title: Create Generic Codes
genericMethodText.subtitle: Use this method if the following criteria matches your use case:

details.line1: All codes will have the same value.
details.line2: I want to generate a number of code for arbitrary recipients.
details.line3: Names and Emails cannot be associated with the code.

BulkCodes.chargeConsentText: By clicking Issue Codes, you agree that above amount will be charged to your account.
BulkCodes.invalidEmailWarningText: Please make sure that the Recipient Email is a valid email. Using dummy or invalid emails will lead to account suspension.
BulkCodes.termsAndPrivacyText: Read more about our <termsLink>terms and conditions</termsLink> and the <privacyPolicyLink>privacy policy</privacyPolicyLink>.
BulkCodes.unitsPerCodeRequired: Each code should contain at least 1 unit.
BulkCodes.codeQuantityRequired: You need to create at least 1 code.
BulkCodes.unitsPerCodeInvalidRange: One code can contain a maximum of 1000 units.
BulkCodes.codeQuantityInvalidRange: A maximum of 5000 codes can be created.
BulkCodes.featureAvailability: This feature is available only for partner projects.
BulkCodes.planetCashDisabled: PlanetCash is not activated. Please activate PlanetCash to use this feature.
BulkCodes.addBalanceGeneric: Please Click here to add funds.

instructionsUploadCSV.empty: Drag and drop / click to select a .xslx / .csv file for upload.
instructionsUploadCSV.error: Please check for issues and drag .xslx / .csv file here to upload.
instructionsUploadCSV.processing: Please wait while we analyze your file...
instructionsUploadCSV.success: Continue or drag .xlsx or .csv file here to replace current file.

errorUploadCSV.tooManyFiles: Please upload only a single file.
errorUploadCSV.fileTooSmall: The uploaded file seems to be empty.
errorUploadCSV.fileTooLarge: The uploaded file must be 5MB or less.
errorUploadCSV.missingColumns: The uploaded file does not contain the following columns:
errorUploadCSV.tooManyRecipients: A maximum of 1000 recipients can be processed in one transaction.
errorUploadCSV.unitsNotProvided: Units are missing/invalid for some recipients.
errorUploadCSV.notifyNotPossible: Email and name are missing for some recipients that are to be notified.
errorUploadCSV.instructionRowError: An error occurred on the 1st row. Please check if you have deleted the instructions, or if there is additional data.
errorUploadCSV.invalidEmails: recipient_email contains dummy/invalid emails on the following rows: {rowList}. Please remove invalid emails or add valid emails.
errorUploadCSV.generalError: Something went wrong. Please try after a while.

BulkCodes.importInstructions: Please refer to the <docsLink>documentation here</docsLink>, download <excelLink>Excel template here</excelLink>, and <csvLink>CSV template here.</csvLink>

tableHeaderHelpText.recipient_name: Optional. Name of the recipient, shown on the certificate and if opted in, in the mail sent to the recipient. Required if you want to send emails.
tableHeaderHelpText.recipient_email: Optional. Required to send certificate to the recipient by email.
tableHeaderHelpText.recipient_notify: Optional. Select Yes if you want Plant-for-the-Planet to inform the recipient via email automatically.
tableHeaderHelpText.units: Mandatory. Number of trees that are given to the recipient, e.g., 5 for 5 trees
tableHeaderHelpText.recipient_message: Optional. Message to the recipient that is included in the email if notify is yes. A default message will be sent if not provided.

BulkCodes.donationSuccess: Your donation was successful. Redirecting you to view donation details shortly...

donationError.planet_cash_insufficient_credit: Available credit = {availableBalance}. Please load balance in your PlanetCash account to make this donation.
donationError.default: Something went wrong. Please try after a while.
donationError.planet_cash_invalid_project: You cannot make a donation to the selected project.

BulkCodes.fileUploadWarning: This will remove your existing recipient data, do you want to continue?
BulkCodes.unsavedDataWarning: Some recipient data is unsaved. Do you wish to proceed? Unsaved data will be lost
